Les pouvoirs peuvent Ãªtre affichÃ©s dans la discussion grÃ¢ce Ã  un bouton roll.  Translation : This character sheet is based on Dichim Zoug's one. There are tabs for character, returning and shaani. It's better to create a character dedicated to the players' Shaani. There is a 'Schemes Magic' section : you can click on runes pictures to switch them from grayed to colored state (learnt, not learnt). In the stuff tab, there is a roll button next to the Armimales names that can display the name and the ability of the Armimale in the chat. There is a stock section with checkbox to track the character's stock. Powers can be displayed in the chat thanks to a roll button.
